pr_title: Rename `ThisLiteral` to `This`, because it's not a literal

timeline.message: Don't require Javadoc for this pull request

timeline.bodyText: I find this name a little confusing.  I don't know what an implicit key word is.  I think ThisNode, ExplicitThisNode, and ImplicitThisNode are a little less confusing.  (Although, ThisNode might be confusing.)  (I'm ok with *KeywordNode versions, too.)
timeline.author: smillst
